Synthia Saint James (amụrụ na Febụwarị 11, 1949) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nkírí, onye edemede, onye isi okwu, na ónyé nkụzi

A maara ya nke ọma maka imepụta ihe osise mbụ nke mbipụta hardcover nke akwụkwọ Terry McMillan bụ Waiting to ExhaleO mekwara stampụ Kwanzaa mbụ màkà United States Postal Service, nke e wepụtara na 1997. Mgbe ahụ, o mepụtara 2016 Kwanzaa Forever Stamp.
A zụlitere Synthia Saint James na Los Angeles, California, na Bronx, New York. O rere ihe osise mbụ ya na New York City mgbè ọ dị afọ 20
Ọ bi na Los Angeles ugbu a.
Saint James nwèrè ihe ngosi nka nke mbụ ya na Inner City Cultural Center na Los Angeles, California, na 1977, ébé ọ gụrụ ihe nkírí
N'afọ 1980, o sonyere na ngosi mba ụwa mbụ ya na Paris, France.
Ọ natara nzèrè doctorate (Doctor of Humane Letters) site na Mahadum Saint Augustine, Raleigh, North Carolina, na Mee 8, 2010.
Saint James na-aga kwa afọ na kọleji, mahadum, na ébé ndị ọzọ iji kụzie ma mee master classes na workshops.
